item.title: Python NOSQL Api
item.description: The world of databases is truly vast. But it is governed by a standard that respects the SQL language API. But there is another world; that of NOSQL databases. A little tidy There are four types of NOSQL databases: Key/Value database Column database Document database Graph database These four types of databases, unfortunately, do not respond to any API and the various libraries, such as the python ones, have various objects and various methods for extracting and inserting data.
